summary: Changed Ionas face to look much sexier.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This Mod improves Iona (Housecarl of Rifton) looks. I tried to make her look less like an old lady and more like a young and strong woman.

Main differences to vanilla version: 
-changed stance to female 
-deleted her default outfit. I put every item she is carrying in the vanilla game in her inventory. That way you can either equip her normal steel armor or remove it from her inventory and give her any armor and weapons you want.
-looks waaaay better

Mods used in screenshots:
-Apachii Hair
-CBBE V3 / Official CBBE Face Pack
-coverwomen look 3
-Eye colours with new style Eyelashes
-HQ Eyebrows - vanilla texture replacers
-OblivionHairPackAIO
-Seductive Lips HD
-Skyrim NPC Editor
author: SkyrimJM
